com.smaato.soma
Class BannerItem

java.lang.Object
  com.smaato.soma.BannerItem

public abstract class BannerItem
extends java.lang.Object

Displays a banner using lowlevel functionality.

Copyright Smaato Inc. 2007, 2008

Parameters:
